file_content.text: N4-01 = Imperial communications unit // Messages = terminated
N4-01 = Imperial communications unit // Emergency protocol = activated
Recorded message = now playing
This is Darth Malgus of the Expeditionary Fleet to all available forces.
If you are receiving this, you have been judged an asset, and the Empire requires your strength. It is your privilege and your duty.
Not just my master... but the Empire turns to me.
At last, others seek my power.
So a Darth has decided I'm worth his attention. How fascinating.
This should be interesting.
Droid--when was this recorded? Who delivered it?
Tell me about this message.
Time stamp = 146 minutes old // Delivery = via priority HoloNet frequency
Now the Sith judge me an "asset." Guess I have a reputation.
Nice to get some respect.
I've never heard of a "Darth Malgus."
Who is that?
Records = accessed // Darth Malgus = Sith Lord + destroyer of Jedi Temple + fleet commander
Playback = resuming
[Listen to the message]
The alien Advozse Hegemony has established "Hammer Station"--a mobile battle platform that threatens our borders.
You will join the strike team assembling at Vaiken Spacedock to be briefed in full. In the name of the Emperor.
Do we know anything about this battle station or the Advozsec Hegemony?
I'd like more information.
Advozsec Hegemony = breakaway colony + six star systems // Hammer Station = classified
Very well, I agree.
You expect me to fly into space on the word of a hologram?
That was awfully vague.
Vaiken Spacedock = recommended destination // Emergency protocol = terminated
N4-01 = Imperial communications unit // Messages = not available
